body.name: Native 1080P Projector with 5G WiFi Bluetooth (with Tripod), 14000L 4K Supported Home Projector, Portable Outdoor Projector with Max 300" Display, Movie Projector Compatible with TV Stick, HDMI, Phone

features: 🎄***Native 1080P & 4K Support*** Our HD 1080P projector has taken the 2023 latest Projection Technology and adopted the highest native resolution 1920*1080 pixels, contrast ratio of 10000:1 and 350 ANSI high brightness. By combining the innovative high-refraction 5 layers LCD lens, This projector offers the sharpest and detailed Full HD and vivid images to ensure the best video experience to our customers.

🎄***Latest 5G WIFI with Portable Tripod***With latest WiFi connection technology, this WIFI projector enables Android/IOS/Laptop device to synchronize screen mirroring by both 2.4G and 5G WiFi, Ultra-fast 5G WiFi offer you a much smoother, stable, and lag-free online videos/Gaming/Microsoft APP playing experience. (Copyright videos like Netflix and more need to be connected to a TV stick (not included) or HDMI cable to watch)

🎄***Advanced Bluetooth Connectivity Technology*** It is also a Bluetooth Projector. You can Wirelessly pair with your Bluetooth speaker, headphones, soundbar anytime and anywhere. It is a outdoor movie projector with WIFI and Bluetooth, you can also can hook up external speakers if you do not have Bluetooth speaker, the sound is greatly enhanced and sounded theater quality. The built-in stereo surround speaker is good enough to enjoy the pleasure sounds in different scenes

🎄***Largest 300inch Widescreen for Home Theater***Native 1080P outdoor Projector supports the Max 300Inch Display which allows you to enjoy your family movie nights in a large screen and protect your eyes by our latest diffuse reflection imaging technology. QK06 WIFI Home Theater projector greatly designed for home entertainment and office presentations.

🎄***Multiple Connection for All Home Entertainment***This movie projector with WIFI and bluetooth is also equipped with HDMI/USB/AV/SD port which can properly compatible with TV stick, Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop, Video Games, USB stick, micro USB card, etc. to expand your home entertainment for more fun and colorful. This home proyector provides flexibility and fidelity images for our customers indoor and outdoor movies.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Projection? Simply put, when it comes to watching movies or playing video games, bigger is always better. Sitting at appropriate distance from a 100-inch or larger image engages more of your peripheral vision, lets you see details that are lost on most TVs, and attract you into the story in a way that's just not possible with even a 75- or 85-inch flatpanel. If you turn off your phone like you do down at the cineplex, it makes movie viewing a true escape. Why Choose A Home projector Not a TV? The biggest difference between a TV and a projector is the size of image you can get. A projector will give you a massive 100"+ image. Many people have a 120” and even 150” screens in their home. The average home television is usually around 50"-65".Projectors are far more portable. Large TV's can weigh 100kg or even more! Most projectors will weigh around 5kg, so you can easily take it with you to a mates place or take it to work for a presentation. Large TV's require specialty delivery and installation services.Better for your eyes. When you view a projected image you are viewing reflected light. This is far easier on the eyes than direct light shining at your from a TV.Better for the environment. Projectors are smaller and use far less materials to manufacture than a typical TV. New Laser type projectors also more energy efficient.Safety. Large TV's can weigh over 80kg so should be secured to ensure they can't fall. There have been cases where children have accidentally knocked a TV and had it fall on them. Projectors can be secured to the ceiling out of reach. If using a large TV always make sure it is secured to the wall so it cannot fall.Immersion. There is nothing like watching a big hollywood blockbuster on the big screen at home. Watching on a big projection screen simply doesn't compare with a TV.

Why Choose Our Home Movie Projector？ First One: Real Native 1920*1080P, 4K Supported Deeper Colours: 1080p projectors deliver deeper and more vivid colors. They incorporate a wide range of hues to ensure there is no “bleeding” at the edges. With the vibrant colors, the viewing experience is the same regardless of your sitting position or distance from the screen. Sharper Detail and Enhanced Clarity The average 1080p projector delivers five times the resolution on your Standard Definition TV. This dramatic difference in sharpness is instantly visible. You will notice finer details like color specks in the eyes of video characters, sweat drops, creases and other such finer details that can be lost otherwise. Regardless of whether you need a projector for business or for your home theatre, a 1080p projector will deliver better clarity in comparison to lower options.

Second: Projector with 5G+2.4G WIFI What is 5G WIFI: 5G will be able to connect more devices and transmit more data than ever before, delivering fast connectivity and significantly enhanced user experiences. Ultra-fast 5G WiFi quickly eliminates lag for a seamless and smooth gaming experience. 2.4G WiFi coverage is wider and more versatile. You can always choose what you want.

Third: Projector with Bluetooth 5.1 QK06 movie projector built-in latest 5.1 Bluetooth chip for faster and more stable transmission. It be easily connected to a Bluetooth speaker/Bluetooth headset. HiFi high-fidelity stereo surround sound system for enhanced movie immersion. Note: Bluetooth function does not support phone.

Fourth: Latest Heat Dissipation function and Eye Protection Lower Noise, Better Experience We know the low noise is very important for a movie projector. Thanks to the upgraded cooling system and latest Heat dlissipation function , the QK06 home theater projector is more efficient in cooling. Fan noise is 60% lower than comparable projectors for an amazing listening experience. Eye Protection We care about our customer, so we have improved our LED light source to project a more uniform brightness and less damage to the eyes without changing the brightness.

Fifth: High Brightness Clearer Image with 350ANSI A brightness rating in ANSI lumens gives you a more accurate idea of how bright the projector’s lamp will be. This indicates that the lamp’s brightness has been tested according to industry standards and a true rating arrived at. You’ll sometimes hear more cynical experts referring to standard lumens as “marketing lumens” because the figures are so often fudged or inflated. If there is an ANSI lumen rating on a projector, this is the one you should go by; if it only says “lumens,” you may need to take the rating with a grain of salt, especially if you’re not familiar with the brand. QK06 video projector offers 350 ASIN high brightness and 90% NTSC color gamut. You'll get sharper, more vibrant colors and a brighter picture. Enjoy a movie feast with your friends and family anytime. Note: It is recommended to choose a room with slightly darker light to create a perfect home theater.

So Choose QK06 Home Theater Projector- Relax In Your Own Cinema NOTE: 1. Due to copyright reasons, if there is no sound when playing videos from Netflix, Hulu, etc, please turn off Dolby. 2. Due to app copyright, watch movies on Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, only via connect a laptop, fire tv stick, Roku, or Chrome cast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it!! The sounds is amazing, the picture on my wall is super clear and crisp. No need for a projector screen. You can turn the lens to focus. I also tested the other options as well. It works great with my iPhone screen share. Small delay to connect. Easy set up to your WiFi. Come with everything in the photo. I had no need for the tripod it looks sturdy. I would recommend this for anyone as great gift. I have not had any vision issues. Batteries are not included for the remote. The screen plays pretty decent during the day time but at night it’s even better. It’s a tad bit noisy but you don’t notice it after awhile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great projector for outdoor entertainment
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this projector for my backyard and I'm very happy with it. Here are some of the things I liked and disliked about it:- Pros: - The price to performance ratio is high. It delivers an amazing picture quality for its cost. - It has a crisp and bright picture. I used it with a 150-inch screen and watched some baseball games. The colors were vibrant and the details were sharp. - It has a decent built-in speaker. It was loud enough for me to hear the commentary and the crowd noise. - It operates quietly. It is much quieter than my old projector, which used to make a lot of noise. - It is easy to set up and use. I hooked up a Fire TV stick using the HDMI port and the built-in USB port for power. Everything worked smoothly.- Cons: - The built-in airplay feature couldn't handle protected content. It worked fine when I mirrored my phone screen for photos and videos I took, but it blacked out when I tried to play protected content, such as Netflix or Hulu.Overall, I think this projector is a great buy for anyone. It is perfect for watching movies, sports, or games with your family or friends.I give this projector 5 stars out of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little projector
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This projector has great picture quality and sounds better than my last projector that cost more. It’s portable and pretty bright for its size, and easy to set up. It has a mechanical keystone correction and could benefit from some additional software options, but at this price point it’s better than I expected. Overall a great projector for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My only gripe is the lag between audio and sound when screen sharing via phone. It’s very simple to set up, directions are super helpful and packaging protected it despite holiday mail rush. If you don’t mind the visuals being 2-3 seconds later than the sounds heard… it’s perfect. Some shows I revert to the TV because it can be annoying to hear action sounds or voices then see what happened seconds later (crying emoji) super crisp and giant presentation plus well priced. ENJOY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changing Home Entertainment Experience!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the "5G WiFi Bluetooth Native 1080P Projector". This projector has exceeded my expectations in so many ways, making it an absolute must-have for anyone looking to enhance their movie nights or outdoor gatherings.Impressive Clarity and 4K SupportWhat struck me first about this projector is its native 1080P resolution. The image quality is incredibly clear and sharp, whether I'm watching movies, or my son was playing games . It's also worth noting that it supports 4K input, which means it can handle high-resolution content effortlessly.Bright and Large DisplayWith 14,000 lumens of brightness, this projector ensures that my visuals are vibrant, even when I use it in lit rooms. At night around the campfire this projector outshined our last projector, if was incredible.Versatile ConnectivityI appreciate the range of connectivity options this projector offers. It can connect to TV sticks, HDMI devices, smartphones, and tablets with ease. We connected a TV Stick directly to the projector with no issues. The built-in WiFi and Bluetooth features are handy for streaming content and connecting external speakers for the full immersive sound experience.Portable ConvenienceThis projector's versatility is one of its standout features. I used it for movie nights at the campsite with friends and family so far both indoors and outdoors, thanks to its portability and tripod support. The carry handle on the projector made it easy to move around.In conclusion, the "5G WiFi Bluetooth Native 1080P Projector" has been an excellent addition to my home entertainment setup. Its impressive image quality, ease of use, and versatile connectivity options have made my viewing and my sons camping gaming experiences more enjoyable than ever.If you're looking to elevate your entertainment setup, I highly recommend considering this projector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, quiet, great pic, good low light - great for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I wanted an inexpensive projector that could be used now and then as a kid's playroom TV. I like this one. You can tell from the video I attached that even when the room's lights are on the picture is still very watchable. When the lights are off it's like a wall size TV. The sound is decent. The remote is great. The unit is light, quiet, and easy to use. It has all the inputs you'd expect of a much more expensive unit. It's not the best projector I've ever seen. It's the best one I've seen for the price.
